name: Flashants
tag_list: mobile, ecard, greeting-card, slideshow, slide-show, mobile-video, mobile-slide-show, mobile-sharing, personalize, mobile-greeting-card, mobile-photo-sharing, mobile-video-message
overview:
YouVivid is a personalized video message, slideshow, photo e-card, and ringtone making and sharing services for mobile.

YouVivid enables users to create musical video clip online by picking up animation template among categories and personalize it with user’s photos and text. The result animation clip called uCard which can be shared online by email or blog widget in Adobe Flash format, or be sent to iPhone and smart phones in mobile video format.

YouVividâ€™s templates design is open to all users. Anyone who is interested in designing templates for the mobile services can download the uCard’s Flash components to design and test the templates in Adobe Flash authoring tool. After a new template is created, it can be uploaded to YouVivid to be used by the author or be open to share with other users.

Features of YouVivid

  1. Easy to use. By snapping in images and text editing, users can make musical animation with fancy photo transition effect in minutes.
  2. Personalization. Users can create mobile slideshows, video ringtones, and greeting cards with personal photos and texts.
  3. Cross platform sharing. Offer multiple options to share uCard by mobile, email, blog widget, and video download.
  4. Support Asian language characters rendered in true type font. User’s input text is dynamically rendered from the true type font generator. Unlike the most online slide show service that only render Asian text in ugly system font, userâ€™s text in uCard animation is rendered in perfect font type with any language characters including Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Turkish …
  5. Open template design. YouVivid provide complete tutorial and toolkit download in the Designer Area of the site. The open template feature enables users to design templates for his personal use or to contribute them to the community.
